1.title: Geen daden maar woorden
1.plot: The plain and simple existence of four aspiring poets doesn't comply to their dreams and expectations. The unbearable lightness of reality leads to the realization they desperately need to become who they feel they really are.

2.title: Hier is Johnny
2.plot: A shrink who only sees his own finances shrink, hastily slaps together a commercial to try and enforce destiny. Four wandering souls are each looking for something different, but coincidence sees them finding each other.

3.title: Een publicatie is een publicatie
3.plot: An unforeseen phone call triggers a tidal wave of wistfulness, envy and (un)pleasant surprises. All of this on the day of the very first meeting of poetry collective Elevation.

4.title: Ontbering stimuleert de dichter
4.plot: Publisher and benefactor Harry De Baes invites Elevation's poets for a writing and team building weekend on an unknown destination. No one quite has the weekend they expected nor hoped for.

5.title: De naam is een voorteken
5.plot: Fame beckons. Career-wise Elevation's poets have every reason to be happy. But they're not. Existential doubt, melancholy and financial worries are troubling them. Masks are falling off. Except on some shady film set.

6.title: Allen die vallen of toch op zijn minst struikelen
6.plot: Quite a few prominent guests in Ghent's literary scene are invited to Elevation's first poetry reading. Aza, Mitchell, Ludovic and Noor are determined to showcase their talents. Expectations rise high, but then gravity kicks in.

7.title: Dood zijn en beginnen
7.plot: Time stands still and the clock ticks madly on. One month after the poetry reading, the road to happiness turns out to be a cul-de-sac. When words have vanished, only acts of hope can dissolve the deadlock.

imdb.plot outline: Misantropica is a hybrid between a sitcom and a soap about existential fear and solipsism. The web series follows four aspiring poets lost in the banality of their own lives. Coincidence unites them in a poetry collective, an alliance of ambitions and illusions where each is struggling for recognition and against envy and themselves. A yuppie-like benefactor, a psychiatrist in need of therapy and an all too diligent servant for the unemployment agency complicate their road to success. Playwright Yannick Van Puymbroeck created this DIY-series in 2015 with a budget of exactly EUR0. Not only was he responsible for scenario and direction, but without any prior experience he also managed filming, sound and editing. The main cast was made up by some of the actors of his former theatre company Arto Bruto.
imdb.title: Misantropica
plot: Four aspiring poets lost in the banality of their own lives. Coincidence unites them in a poetry collective, an alliance of ambitions and illusions where each is struggling for recognition and against envy and themselves.

_Misantropica_ (qv) is a hybrid between a sitcom and a soap about existential fear and solipsism. The web series follows four aspiring poets lost in the banality of their own lives. Coincidence unites them in a poetry collective, an alliance of ambitions and illusions where each is struggling for recognition and against envy and themselves. A yuppie-like benefactor, a psychiatrist in need of therapy and an all too diligent servant for the unemployment agency complicate their road to success. Playwright Yannick Van Puymbroeck created this DIY-series in 2015 with a budget of exactly EUR0. Not only was he responsible for scenario and direction, but without any prior experience he also managed filming, sound and editing. The main cast was made up by some of the actors of his former theatre company Arto Bruto.
